quote.text: Lies are essential to humanity. They are perhaps as important as the pursuit of pleasure and moreover are dictated by that pursuit.
Truth is so rare that it is delightful to tell it.
Truth is incontrovertible, ignorance can deride it, panic may resent it, malice may destroy it, but there it is.
It's not enough to speak, but to speak true.
It is hard to believe that a man is telling the truth when you know that you would lie if you were in his place.
Half a truth is often a great lie.
When you want to fool the world, tell the truth.
Of all the animals, man is the only one that lies.
A man is never more truthful than when he acknowledges himself a liar.
If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
I never did give them hell. I just told the truth, and they thought it was hell.
The truth is always a trick to those who live among lies.
